caption.p: LINC00466 regulates glioma cell activity and sensitivity to TMZ treatment by targeting miR-137. ( A) The viability, ( B and C) migration combined with invasion abilities of T98G and A172 cells in different treatment groups were measured by CCK8 assay and Transwell assay; ( D) Effects of LINC00466 and miR-137 on resistance of glioma cells to TMZ (200uM).
